header.title: A Geshi Syntax Highlighter
header.description: Adds a BBCode 'syntax' which allows you to post programs/scripts in up to 202 languages and have the post Syntax Highlighted using GeSHi.
header.author-notes:
The added BBCode will not be shown on the posting page as this mod is hooked into phpBB (and as such this mod processes the message text AFTER phpBB has parsed all the BBCodes it knows how to deal with), however, you can alter the 'Custom BBCodes Page' mod by stokerpiller to show how to use the syntax tag. Check the 'contrib/boardbbcodes_changes.txt' file for details on the changes.
If you wish to use the scripting/programming langauge as a BBCode tag then see the file: contrib/lang_as_bbcode_tag.txt for information on what to change to enable the feature.
Thanks are due to: CyberAlien - for releasing the original BBCode parser to the public. baboon - for (at time of posting this) a part complete Spanish translation mrbaseball34 - for the idea to use the language as a BBCode tag Bigwebmaster - for pointing out some errors I'd missed... and the fact that 'debug mode' is there for a reason.

changelog.change: test release
Updated GeSHi to version 1.0.8.3
changed version number and state from DEV to RC
fixed bug in bbc_download.php
altered CSS
Removed static text and added them to 'language/en/common.php'
Changed CSS Class name from 'code ...' to 'syntax ...'
now works in PM, PM Preview, PM History, Message Review, Message Preview
altered bbc_download.php to use requeat_var and now can download code from PM
altered DIY Instructions to also include info about refreshing Theme data
moved some hard coded language stuff into language files
removed use of $GLOBAL array
updated GeSHi to version 1.0.8.4
minor issues fixed as pointed out by the phpBB.com MOD Team
version not released
if the basic tag is used, i.e. [syntax] then the mod will add line numbers, as it previously did
changed 'syntax=' to 'lang='
if either [syntax=lang name] or [syntax lang=lang name] is used then, by default, no line numbers will be shown
added the ability to use [language name], i.e. [ asp ] .. [ /asp ] for an ASP code listing
added lines option can be either 'lines=geshi-n' for normal geshi generated line numbers or 'lines=geshi-f' for fancy lines also generated by geshi

added fancy option which is only used with the 'geshi-f', as detailed above, to specify which lines should be fancy, i.e. if 5 is specified then every 5th line will be fancy, the default is 5 if no value is specified
Now works in MCP when viewing reported posts preview
Fixed other issues when DEBUG mode was enabled
added method to remove the link stuff added by phpBB
Redone the way a function works... the mod now works where it used to before I broke it
Moved xs_bbcode_fn.js to classes/scripts as it's a common file
Removed ./ as root path prefix and replaced with {ROOT_PATH}
Added SubSilver 2 support
Altered some code that should have stopped the mod being validated.
Lots of other fixes I don't remember after all when you're without a PC for a while it's easy to forget what changes you've made...
Stopped the syntax tag being parsed if BBCode tags are malformed (in the wrong order)
Bug fix release
updated GeSHi to version 1.0.8.10
added a bbcode drop down menu with a full list of languages to select from

action-group.diy-instructions:
Once the updated files are uploaded to the remote server perform the following steps: 1. Login to ACP and Clear the Cache (button on admin index page) 2. Refresh the Style Theme data (from Styles Tab) 3. Refresh the Style Template data (from Styles Tab)
4. go edit a post to see the new bbcode drop down menu. you can select any text, the use the drop down menu to select a language, and it will be properly wrapped.
